guide:
# Fiction Canon Guide

## Characters
One file per named character. Include:
- Core facts (age, appearance, role)
- Personality and voice notes
- Arc trajectory
- Constraints (things this character would never do)

## Locations
One file per significant location. Include:
- Physical description and atmosphere
- What typically happens here
- Sensory details (sounds, smells, light)
